diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Immune Dysregulation, Polyendocrinopathy, Enteropathy, X-Linked Syndrome (IPEX)
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis of IPEX was clinically suspected and confirmed by the presence of a mutation in the FOXP3 gene. This was supported by the patient's symptoms, including protracted diarrhea, insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus, ichthyosiform dermatitis, and autoantibodies detected against pancreatic islet cells.
